Name: Undead Souls
About the game: Undead Souls is an arcade game about killing enemies trying to Beat your Score in a gun filled randomly generated levels. In this version of the game you will have the option to challenge yourself trying to beat your score. In this game you will enter an environment randomly generated with full of enemies and try to kill as many as you can. Features Unique items with special effects; There is a thrill in this game as the levels are randomly generated

Meta Description: Looking for information on Undead Souls? Check out the release date (Aug 25, 2020), developer insights from Rootify, and a complete game summary.
